page.title: 12PLAYGROUND GAMES (1)
page.content: In the playground we play lots of different games. Some of them are chasing games like{Kiss Chase}and all the{Tick games _ Chain Tick, Snowman Tick, Tick Off Ground, Ambulance Tick, Bob Tick, Ball Tick, Line Tick, Scarecrow Tick, Bulldog Tick. In the winter the boys usually play {football}and in the summer{rounders. Some of the girls play football and rounders but more usually they play {singing games}or{clapping games}or {skipping. The clapping games have names like "Eidelweiss", "Under the Bramble Bushes" and "When Susie was a Baby". "I went to California", "The Wind, the Wind", "Red Letter" and "To make an Apple Dumpling" are all singing games. There are lots and lots more and many skipping rhymes too.
